Merge pull request #19 from bcgsc/develop

Formatting and cleanup
replace tabs with spaces to be consistent across package
log all params on startup; move release to config; remove user-specific paths
rename nextflow processes based on groovy style guide
quote simple strings with single quotes
format comments per python and groovy style guides
wrap lines to 100 char; remove extra whitespace
removed decoy contig from Mutect commands
switch to samtools and increase default RAM request
SPLIT TMB into :  genome, CDS, protein, panel
First working version for Panel TMB
Now creating mutsig figures for the final calls
Adding script to make mutational spectum results
Not working yet. Just pulled the Mutect2 files in.
Added RTGtools and GATK to the tools in the container.
Changed to keep the hs37d5 reference internal to the container.
Adding the reference directly in to the container.
Prepping for first release. Tidying up README.
Added the python script that split up the Strelka SNVs by AF.
Allele counts now split into individual VCF files
Getting the first verson of the AF histogram plotting
EDIT:   Updating the README for the new pipeline.
EDIT:  Modified to pull the container down from sylabs at runtime.
EDIT: Removing old comments from before the container was introduced.

Merge branch 'master' of https://svn.bcgsc.ca/bitbucket/scm/rcorbett/profyle_tmb

The container recipe was edited on a different machine where singularity
builds can be created.  It uses a different filesystem so the repos got
out of sync.
EDIT:   Updated to only container the binaries used, and nothing  to control the analysis steps.

EDIT: Updating the nextflow setup to use only binaries from the
container.
Updating the repo with the modern version. Still pulling the files into place.
Putting all the files into 1 place.

adding the basics for the documentation
